#Plot

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


## Code to plot
```{r}
#Create a plot
ggplot(all_data, aes(x = Date)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = Value, color = Name), size = 1) +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels =  "%B %d") + # Format x axis: Break each week, show full month and day
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, max(all_data$Value))) +       # Start the y axis at 0 instead of minimum value
  labs(title = "How Sugar and Cofee Afftect Beverage Stock Prices",
       subtitle ="Using Future Prices of Commodity on Quandl", # Subtitle
       caption = "Data from Yahoo and Quandl",
       color = "Legends") +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r all_data}
summary(all_data)
```

## Plots

```{r all data, echo=FALSE}
plot(all_data)
```
